oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Populations nord-atlantiques et méditerranéenne de Bathypterois dubius (Aulopiformes : ipnopidae)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Quero, Jean-claude
Ribes, V
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Synonymy
Populations
MED
ANE
B. mediterraneus
Bathypterois dubius
Ipnopidae
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A northern North Atlantic population of Bathypterois dubius is distinguished and compared to the southern North Atlantic population and the Mediterranean population. B. mediterraneus is a junior synonym of B. dubius. NOT CONTROLLED OCR
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Cybium (Société Française d'Ichtyologie), 1999-02 , Vol. 23 , N. 2 , P. 200-204
